trends: There have been 53 other sightings in Rochester
There were no other sightings in Rochester on or around October 31st 2008
divs: sighting detailsthe witness stated that on october 31st, 2008 last year on halloween he was intentionally looking for anomallies or ufos in the night sky. this occurred in mendon, ny. it was a cloudy night and he was about to leave when he saw a star moving in the sky which caught his attention. it was moving faster than normal stars, and coming straight at him. it was very far away but it looked like a star, but what caught his attention was that he could hear it. it was very 'loud' and then it turned direction upward then blinked out\disappeared. he theorized it to be a military space operation or one of rochester's air crafts, since there is an air base very close by. but he estimated the direction of the star to be traveling from buffalo or canada. the noise was very loud, like a 'jet engine' or a plane taking off. it sounded as if it were 20 times closer than it really was, and the low rumble continued.
